summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for the account of Verum Corporation for the period of February 1, 2017, to February 28, 2017. It details the account balances, transactions, and service charges associated with the account.

persons.name: Cesar Taverns
persons.context: Cesar Taverns is identified as the relationship manager for the account held by Verum Corporation.

keyFacts: The account belongs to Verum Corporation.
The statement covers the period from February 1, 2017, to February 28, 2017.
The beginning balance was $10,568.68 and the ending balance was $10,405.68.
A withdrawal of $163.00 was made on February 10, 2017, for a Paychex invoice.
The standard monthly service charge was waived due to meeting certain criteria.
